entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
